text:
@Swamy39 @narendramodi government shld lower the interest rates if not forgo till the end of this year. 
#IncomeTax shld be relaxed, we as middle class are screwed up during March & April and most of us are uncertain about the future...   change in #FM would be welcome move. #coronavirus
